title: TD Cowen Says This Chip Stock (Not Nvidia) Is the Best Idea for 2026
description: TD Cowen is bullish on AMD stock, citing the chipmaker's continued AI product expansion in 2025.
content: Nvidia (NVDA) continues to dominate headlines in the AI segment in 2025. However, TD Cowen believes investors should look elsewhere for the best opportunity in 2026. The investment firm has placed Ad… [+4206 chars]
